Package au.csiro.pathling.aggregate

Class AggregateProvider

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.aggregate.AggregateProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResourceProvider
@Component @Scope("prototype") @Profile("server") public class AggregateProvider extends Object implements IResourceProvider
HAPI resource provider that provides an entry point for the "aggregate" type-level operation.
Author:
John Grimes
